com.opensource.bitmapfun.util

类 Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opensource.bitmapfun.util.Utils

  • public class Utils
extends Object
    Class containing some static utility methods.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static int IO_BUFFER_SIZE 

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static void disableConnectionReuseIfNecessary()
      Workaround for bug pre-Froyo, see here for more info: http://android-developers.blogspot.com/2011/09/androids-http-clients.html
      static int getBitmapSize(Bitmap bitmap)
      Get the size in bytes of a bitmap.
      static File getCacheDir(Context context)
      Get internal cache directory.
      static File getExternalCacheDir(Context context)
      Get the external app cache directory.
      static int getMemoryClass(Context context)
      Get the memory class of this device (approx. per-app memory limit)
      static long getUsableSpace(File path)
      Check how much usable space is available at a given path.
      static boolean hasActionBar()
      Check if ActionBar is available.
      static boolean hasExternalCacheDir()
      Check if OS version has built-in external cache dir method.
      static boolean hasExternalStorage()
      Check if OS has external storage.
      static boolean hasHttpConnectionBug()
      Check if OS version has a http URLConnection bug.
      static boolean isExternalStorageRemovable()
      Check if external storage is built-in or removable.

        public static void disableConnectionReuseIfNecessary()
        Workaround for bug pre-Froyo, see here for more info: http://android-developers.blogspot.com/2011/09/androids-http-clients.html

        public static int getBitmapSize(Bitmap bitmap)
        Get the size in bytes of a bitmap.
        参数:
        bitmap -
        返回:

      • isExternalStorageRemovable

        public static boolean isExternalStorageRemovable()
        Check if external storage is built-in or removable.
        返回:
        True if external storage is removable (like an SD card), false otherwise.

      • getExternalCacheDir

        public static File getExternalCacheDir(Context context)
        Get the external app cache directory.
        参数:
        context - The context to use
        返回:
        The external cache dir

        public static long getUsableSpace(File path)
        Check how much usable space is available at a given path.
        参数:
        path - The path to check
        返回:
        The space available in bytes
